name: Sisters in Hotel: Episode 3
description:
After Kaoru confessed to some sisters in love, they go on a trip to the island.
Will the other girls accept this calmly or will they still not be able to give their brother just like that?


“Sisters in hotel” is a drama Visual Novel featuring:

- A deep and heartbreaking storyline that touches many interesting themes and topics
- Brilliant art style, backgrounds and sprites
- Awesome background music
